mapper.sql: id, title, writer, created_at as createdAt, content, view_count as viewCount, comment_count as commentCount, like_count as likeCount, category, tag
mapper.select: SELECT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_board where subject = 1) AS totalRowCount from free_board WHERE subject = 1 order by created_at desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_board where subject = 0) AS totalRowCount from free_board WHERE subject = 0 order by created_at desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT FROM free_board WHERE subject = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board (user_id, content, title, writer, category, tag, subject) VALUES (#{id}, #{content}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{category}, #{tag}, #{subject})
